Y(12575) = intersection, other than A, B, C, of circumconics {{A, B, C, X(41099), Z(27544)}}

Y(12575) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {12100, 12108}, {15759, 16239}, {3, 11540}, {3856, 15690}
